title: open hands: medium skin tone

adjectives: Not closed, something that has been opened.

Affording unobstructed entrance and exit; not shut or closed

Act of applauding.

That part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in primates (including humans).

Part of the fore limb.
The (prehensile) extremity of the superior limb
The manus is the zoological term for the distal portion of the fore limb of an animal.
A hand, as the part of the fore limb below the forearm in a man, or the corresponding part in other vertebrates.
A hand is a prehensile, multi-fingered extremity located at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates such as humans, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.

description: This version of the  Open Hands emoji has the  Medium Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Moderate Brown Skin Tone on supported p
apple_vendor_description: The open hands emoji with medium skin tone, as seen on Apple devices, is a warm and inviting gesture of offering or welcome.  Each finger is distinctly rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and subtle, realistic lighting, creating a tactile and approachable look.  The smooth gradients across the palms and fingers convey a sense of generosity and openness.  This emoji is commonly used to symbolize sharing, giving, accepting, or simply a friendly embrace, all presented with Apple's characteristic polish and inviting visual tone.
